Class Drupal\setka_Editor\Validate\SetkaEditorValidate was not found while trying to analyse it - autoloading is probably not configured properly.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to setka_editor.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
